My favorite language so far is Java â€” itâ€™s declarative, easy to read, and has just the right amount of strictness to catch bugs early. But the language Iâ€™m most fluent in is R, because I study Statistics â€” and R was developed by statisticians, for statisticians ğŸ“ˆ.
